name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Senior QA Engineer with over 10 years of experience in ensuring the quality and performance of backend systems and APIs. Proficient in **Web Testing**, **Mobile Testing**, and **API** testing methodologies to deliver robust and reliable applications. Skilled in using **TestRail**, **Jira**, and **Git** for test management and bug reporting, with an in-depth understanding of **SDLC** and **STLC** processes. Experienced in implementing **A/B Testing**, alongside leveraging **SQL** for data validation and analysis. A solid background in automation testing and a strong commitment to quality assurance, having successfully contributed to significant projects in esteemed organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, utilizing a tech stack that includes **Python** and **Cloud Services (AWS, Azure)**.

experience.responsibilities:
Executed comprehensive **Web Testing** and **Mobile Testing** strategies to ensure the robustness and reliability of applications across multiple platforms.
Utilized **TestRail** for effective test case management, enabling systematic tracking and reporting of testing progress and outcomes.
Implemented **Jira** for agile project management, facilitating sprint planning and bug tracking, resulting in a **25%** increase in issue resolution speed.
Engaged in the entire **SDLC** and **STLC** processes, ensuring alignment with business requirements and quality standards throughout the software development lifecycle.
Conducted detailed **Bug Reporting** and documentation, ensuring transparent communication of defects and adherence to quality benchmarks.
Designed and executed **A/B Testing** scenarios to evaluate feature effectiveness and drive data-driven decision-making for product enhancements.
Leveraged **Git** for version control and collaboration, managing code changes with precision and facilitating team workflows.
Executed SQL queries for data validation, ensuring the integrity of backend systems and accurate data reporting.
Integrated and tested various **API** services to ensure seamless interaction between applications, contributing to a more cohesive user experience.
Automated testing processes to improve efficiency, utilizing cutting-edge frameworks and tools to streamline the QA workflow.

Conducted rigorous Web Testing and Mobile Testing to ensure software quality and functionality across **versions 1.0** and above of all applications.
Utilized **TestRail** and **Jira** for effective Bug Reporting and tracking throughout the Software Development Life Cycle (**SDLC**) and Software Testing Life Cycle (**STLC**), enhancing collaboration and communication with development teams by **30%**.
Implemented Automation strategies in testing processes, resulting in a **25%** reduction in overall testing time and elevating efficiency in A/B Testing scenarios.
Managed and maintained version control using **Git**, facilitating seamless integration and deployments of various testing frameworks and required tools.
Executed SQL queries to validate and analyze data integrity, ensuring that database updates comply with business requirements.
Developed and improved testing APIs to enhance integration testing capabilities, resulting in better debugging processes and reliability of applications.
Collaborated closely with product and engineering teams to review software specifications and develop comprehensive testing plans aligned with business objectives.

Implemented automated testing strategies for REST APIs and WebSocket channels ensuring high-quality performance and compliance with SDLC and STLC methodologies.
Conducted rigorous **Web Testing** and **Mobile Testing** for the trading platform using **TestRail** and **Jira** to effectively track and report bugs, achieving a **95%** bug resolution rate within the first **48 hours** of discovery.
Collaborated with development teams to ensure effective integration of automated tests into the CI pipeline, utilizing **Git** for version control, enhancing team productivity by **30%**.
Designed and executed comprehensive A/B tests on user interactions, utilizing insights to guide product enhancements and improve user experience by **25%**.
Developed and maintained SQL queries and database test cases to validate data integrity and compliance, achieving a **100%** success rate in data validation for critical financial reports.
Utilized **Automation** frameworks and tools to speed up testing cycles, reducing overall testing time by **40%** through streamlined QA processes.
Participated in backlog grooming sessions, providing insights into potential testing issues and feature enhancements based on **Bug Reporting** metrics and team observations.
